scripts.build:assets: copyfiles -u 1 assets/* assets/img/* assets/css/* assets/js/* public
scripts.build:minifycss: minify assets/css/screen.css > public/css/screen.min.css && minify assets/css/print.css > public/css/print.min.css && minify assets/css/home.css > public/css/home.min.css && minify assets/css/ie.css > public/css/ie.min.css && minify assets/css/prism.css > public/css/prism.min.css
scripts.build:minifyjs: minify assets/js/ctm.js > public/js/ctm.min.js && minify assets/js/codepen.js > public/js/codepen.min.js && minify assets/js/prism.js > public/js/prism.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:minifycss && npm run build:minifyjs && npm run build:html
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
